articles.title: Argentina into Rugby World Cup quarterfinals after eliminating Japan with breathless 39-27 win
articles.description: Argentina secured a return to the quarterfinals and knocked out Japan from the Rugby World Cup after winger Mateo Carreras’ hat trick of tries inspired a 39-27 win in a breathless pool-stage eliminator in Nantes on Sunday.
articles.content:
The Associated Press
NANTES, France (AP) — Argentina secured a return to the quarterfinals and knocked out Japan from the Rugby World Cup after winger Mateo Carreras’ hat trick of tries inspired a 39-27 win in a breathless pool-stage eliminator in Na... [4339 chars]

articles.title: Japan 27-39 Argentina: Pumas set up Wales quarter-final with thrilling win
articles.description: A hat-trick from Mateo Carreras carried Argentina into a World Cup quarter-final with Wales as they beat Japan in their winner-takes-all Pool D match.
articles.content:
Argentina fans were in good voice in the final match of Pool D in Nantes

articles.title: Argentina hold off Japan in thriller to secure quarter-final against Wales
articles.description: Against an inspired Japan, a hat-trick of tries from Mateo Carreras earned Argentina a knockout place with a 39-27 win
articles.content: After a magnificent, breathless match that neither team deserved to lose, Argentina are in the last eight and Japan are going home. Mateo Carreras of Newcastle scored a hat-trick as the Pumas set up a meeting with Wales, while the end of the road has... [4931 chars]

articles.title: Argentina into Rugby World Cup quarter-finals after edging Japan in Nantes thriller
articles.description: Mateo Carreras scored three tries to set up clash with Wales in the last eight
articles.content:
Japan 27 Argentina 39
After a magnificent, breathless match that neither team deserved to lose, Argentina are in the last eight of the Rugby World Cup and Japan are going home.

articles.title: Japan 27-39 Argentina: Mateo Carreras hat-trick puts Pumas into Rugby World Cup quarter-finals
articles.description: Wales await in final eight despite Japanese fightback
articles.content:
W ing Mateo Carreras scored three tries as Argentina beat Japan 39-27 on Sunday to reach the Rugby World Cup quarter-finals where they will face Wales.

articles.title: Match Report - Japan 27 - 39 Argentina
articles.description: Wales will face Argentina in their Rugby World Cup quarter-final next weekend after Newcastle winger Mateo Carreras scored three tries in a 39-27 win over a resilient Japan side.
articles.content:
Rugby World Cup: Wales to face Argentina in quarter-finals after Mateo Carreras masterclass holds off Japan

articles.title: Japan v Argentina: Rugby World Cup 2023 - live
articles.description: Daniel Gallan has the updates as the Pumas and the Brave Blossoms meet in a straight shootout for second spot in Pool D
articles.content:
The last time these sides met, Argentina walloped Japan 54-20 . That was back in 2016 and a lot has changed since then. Japan now know they can upset a tier-one team and they also know that Argentina have spluttered so far in France.

articles.title: Argentina down Japan in Nantes thriller to reach last eight
articles.description: Argentina down Japan in Nantes thriller to reach last eight
articles.content:
A clinical hat-trick from winger Mateo Carreras helped hoist Argentina into the World Cup quarter-finals with a 39-27 victory over Japan in a winner-takes-all Pool D shootout at Stade de la Beaujoire on Sunday.
